components.html:
Add offerings to your program

Offerings contain the details of a program instance
components.label: Content

validate.custom: valid=(data.studyStartDate) ? (data.studyStartDate<data.studyEndDate) ? true : 'End Date must be after Study Start Date' : 'Please provide Study Start date';

components.html:
Study breaks

Identify the scheduled breaks that are planned for the program year (Aug 1 to July 31). Breaks should not exceed two weeks, except for the calendar year-end break (December to January) which can be three weeks long. Do not include breaks that are prior to or after the study period
components.label: Content

validate.custom: valid=(data.breakStartDate) ? (data.breakStartDate<data.breakEndDate) ? true : 'End Date must be after Break Start Date' : 'Please provide Break Start date';

components.label: How will this offering be delivered?
